sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-06-27 04:20:25.311340 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-07-13T16:51:23.434616-04:00.

rdgGrp.n: ['protectors', 'the bitter gall of envy rose within me. <del>but i would not disturb their</del>', '', '<del> <unclear extent="2" unit="chars"/>he</del>']

['protectors, the bitter gall of envy rose within me. while neither the feeling of remorse of self accusation mingled with my throes; although the contempt with i was treated also prevented any sublime defiance to have a place in my mind.']
['yours,', 'more horrid even from the very resemblance.']
['despair,', 'but in every way to fit myself for an interview with them']
['moon-shine, even as that frail image and that inconstant shade.<p-end/> <p-start/>"i endeavoured to']
['and nature again assume the barren and bleak appearance it had worn']
['germans"– <del> <unclear extent="1" unit="chars"/> </del> asked de lacey – <del>know</del>"no –they are', 'french', '–but']
['continued,', '‘if', 'you will unreservedly confide to me the particulars of your tale,']

['they returned sooner than i expected and their inopportune appearance destroyed the fruits of so many months patience and expectation. my presence of mind deserted me at this crisis, i thought that', 'i', 'had', 'not', 'a', 'moment', 'to']
